alert.note: Alert for Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 5:02AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Nueces, southwestern San Patricio and central Jim Wells Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 501 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Banquete, or 10 miles northwest of Driscoll, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Robstown, Driscoll, San Patricio, Edroy, Alfred-South La Paloma, Alfred, Calallen, Bluntzer, Banquete, Agua Dulce, Petronila and North San Pedro. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 14 and 22. US Highway 77 between mile markers 656 and 682. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells
